title: 07/07/21 DPS Hour 3 Frank Isola
itunes:title: 07/07/21 DPS Hour 3 Frank Isola
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan, react to Game 1 of the NBA Finals and look at what this series means for the job status of Mike Budenholzer. Sirius XM NBA Host Frank Isola joins the guys to discuss the NBA Finals and look at the major coaching and potential roster moves around the league. Plus, could the ratings for this series prove to be a disaster for the NBA?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
